type.description: The type of the event, always `response.function_shell_command.added`.

sequence_number.description: The sequence number of the event that was emitted.

output_index.description: The index of the output item that was updated.

command_index.description: The index of the shell command that was added.

command.description: The shell command that was added.

title: Response shell command added event
description: A streaming event that indicated a shell command was added to a tool call.
